meanings.sent1: The excludible items were not allowed in the party.
meanings.sent2: It is important to consider excludible factors when making decisions.
meanings.sent3: The excludible chair was left out in the rain and now it's all wet.
meanings.sent4: Her excludible behavior made her stand out from the rest of the group.
meanings.sent5: The bright red sign made the excludible door impossible to miss.

meanings.definition: Capable of being left out or omitted
meanings.sent1: The excludible information was not included in the report.
meanings.sent2: When packing for the trip, she made a list of excludible items.
meanings.sent3: The excludible ingredient was accidentally left off the recipe.
meanings.sent4: His excludible comment added nothing to the conversation.
meanings.sent5: The excludible scene was cut from the final version of the movie.
